I only just put in the request for the suits. The decals are not. Unfortunately Spacedock doesn't seem to let me uncheck <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr>

I'll be honest I wasn't convinced I'd like this at first, thought it might be one that ends up for the chopping block when "mod-pruning"

After playing around with it though, this is never leaving my mod list now!

Thanks [@DirtyFace83](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/131509-dirtyface83/) Both the suits and the flags look brilliant, great work! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-28T00:09:40Z" title="07/28/2021 12:09  AM" data-short="2 yr">July 28, 2021</time> by DirtyFace83**

Suits to 0.5 - Rus/China 'finished'

Also some more silly silly mistakes fixed.

Selected suits aren't appearing on Kerbals when I fly the craft. I don't have any mods that I would suspect clash with the suits. Textures Unlimited?

Are there any dependencies to get them to work?

Hmm

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, Fundati said:
> 
> 
> Selected suits aren't appearing on Kerbals when I fly the craft. I don't have any mods that I would suspect clash with the suits. Textures Unlimited?
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Are there any dependencies to get them to work?
> 

Beyond having the version of KSP that contains the suit style you want to use, there are no dependencies. It should literally be plug and play.

It should be noted that these suits are all EVA suits, so inside the ship you won't see any changes.

Which suits are not working for you? Or is it none of them?

Do you have Texture Replacer installed, and are the Kerbals Jeb, Val, Bill, or Bob?

More Suits.

Added more ESA Base style Pilot, Engineer and Scientist suits: Belgium, Poland, Ireland, Romania, Austria, Portugal, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, Denmark, and although neither are part of the real ESA, Ukraine and Israel because game.  Also added generic EU MKS suits.

**Flags, Decals, etc:**

Pruned things, added decals and flags for countries featured in Suit sets.

See first post for more info.

**Suits:**

Added Netherlands, Finland, and Switzerland to ESA Base style set.

Added Uruguay, Brazil, Argentina, Bolivia, Mexico, Ecuador, Chile, Venezuela, and Paraguay Base style set.

Added Australia, NZ, Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia, South Korea, India, Iran, and North Korea Base style set.
